title: What really happened to Shep Smith of Fox? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have a theory. Very recently, Bill Barr met with Rupert Murdoch. What government business he could possibly have with the Fox News mogul is anyone’s guess. This is mine: Trump didn’t want Shep Smith telling the truth about him. Because Trump never does the dirtiest deeds himself (except for Ukraine, apparently), he sent the Attorney General of the United States to do it for him. Never mind that the AG is supposed to be working for the American people and not for Trump. So, Murdoch and Barr have this conversation and the word comes down to Shep Smith to go a little easier (or maybe a lot) on Trump. The pressure of watching the network spread misinformation and outright lies has been getting to him, anyway, and for Shep this is the last straw.  His colleague seemed just as surprised as his viewers must have been—-this departure was decided rather quickly. If I am right, Fox has officially become Trump State TV.

Shephard Smith finally became so disgusted with Fox News as a propaganda resource that he finally decided he had had it, and resigned. He asked ownership to be let out of his $15 million per year contract, and he fought all of their efforts to keep him on staff. The only question, is will the only remaining real journalist at Fox News (Chris Wallace) follow him out the door… Former Fox News reporter Carl Cameron says he left because of 'partisan misinformation'- June 24, 2019 Conor Powell, Fox News Reporter Conor Powell Quits With Cryptic Facebook Post - August 7, 2018 Second Fox News reporter Adam Housely leaves amid objections to network August 23, 2018 Why are the only real reporters at Fox News fleeing the network?

Shep has not been a big fan of the Dear Orange Leader. He has more than once called Trump out on his lies and his poor behavior. This did not please the Emperor. Shep even had a pseudo-feud going with Trump's favorite Sean Hannity. Bill Barr paid a visit to the higher-ups a few days before Shep left to ”spend more time with his family” which is code for he got out before he was fired. But that is my opinion based on what I’ve read and seen.
A lot speculation from people pretending to know. What are the credentials and sources, or just speculation masquerading as fact?
He finally, after 23 years, got tired of ignoring his personal ethics and squandering his talent.
